Tucson raises a hand.

" I suggest that task should be done in stages.  Try=
ing to do everything at once will lessen and overwhelm our comrades.  If an=
yone has any thoughts on how we should develop these phases we would all li=
ke to hear them.  The more we collaborate the better off we'll be." 

Uproa=
r raises a hand.

" Definitely need a decoy team first.  That way we lure t=
hem out where we can fight them on our field."

Rat Trap raises his hand .
=

"We also need a recon team, who can keep us in the know .  I can set that =
up."

Straight Shot raises her hand.

"And I can head a weapons assault.  I=
 have really good sense of weaponry trajectory."

Quickstride raises his ha=
nd. 

" I can head a field advance pretty well.  "

Tucson turns to Leo Pri=
me. 

They have good ideas.  Perhaps we should roll with them".

Perpetuall=
y on the move and constantly busy.
